name: Project_Brutality
description: This is the primary repository for collaborative efforts between Doom developers on Project Brutality. This is the bleeding-edge version that is constantly being developed on, and not meant in any way shape or form to be representative of the final version of the mod.

name: SevTech-Ages
description: SevTech: Ages is a massive Minecraft modpack packed with content and progression.

name: Nomi-CEu
description: Fork of Nomifactory, using Gregtech CEu and its related mods.
